title: Purely by Accident - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Cross-dressing   Doting Love Interests   Hiding True Identity   Marriage   Royalty
author: 冷千山
description: Through an unlikely series of events, bandit chief Wei Zisong finds herself engaged to Chu Feichen, the emperor's eldest daughter. Through an even more unlikely series of events, they fall in love.>
